About

Design &
Development

Hilary Onyango Okello is the brains behind OnyangoOkello.com. And he has been designing and building software professionaly since 2022.

Before founding his eponymous studio, Hilary pursued a bachelor’s degree in construction management at JKUAT and trained as a certified web developer at Simplon.co.

When he is not at work, Hilary enjoys gardening and cooking. He lives in Kisumu, Kenya.
